dashboard.readout

Class MinimapReadout

  • java.lang.Object
    • acm.graphics.GObject
      • acm.graphics.GCompound
        • dashboard.readout.Readout
          • dashboard.readout.MinimapReadout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    acm.graphics.GContainer, acm.graphics.GScalable, LocationUpdatable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class MinimapReadout
extends Readout
implements LocationUpdatable
    Implements a Readout representing a minimap with pins to mark various locations. The minimap scale can be varied during runtime using the method setViewRadius.
    Author:
    Mark Sabini

      Builder for the MinimapReadout class.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears and deletes all the pins in the MinimapReadout, effectively resetting its state.

      • addPin

        public void addPin(java.lang.String key,
                   acm.graphics.GPoint position,
                   java.awt.Color color)
        Creates and adds a pin with the given key, position, and color. While the pin is added to the MinimapReadout's internal map immediately, it will not be drawn until the next time the MinimapReadout is updated. If a pin with the same key already exists, no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        key - a handle that refers to the pin
        position - the position of the pin
        color - the color of the pin

      • removePin

        public void removePin(java.lang.String key)
        Removes the specified pin from both the display and the MinimapReadout's internal map. If the specified pin could not be found, no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        key - the key referring to the pin to be removed

      • update

        public void update(acm.graphics.GPoint position,
                   acm.graphics.GPoint bearing)
        Updates the MinimapReadout and redraws the entire display relative to the specified position and bearing. If a pin lies outside the boundaries of the face, it will not be drawn.
        Specified by:
        update in interface LocationUpdatable
        Parameters:
        position - the position relative to a datum point
        bearing - the endpoint of a vector from the origin pointing in the desired orientation

      • setViewRadius

        public void setViewRadius(double viewRadius)
        Sets the MinimapReadout's view radius to the one specified by the user. The new view radius must be a nonnegative double.
        Parameters:
        viewRadius - the new view radius of the MinimapReadout
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the view radius is negative
